---
title: "get-outbound-patient-discovery-resp.ts"
---

## High-level description
The `getOutboundPatientDiscoveryResp` function retrieves a list of `OutboundPatientDiscoveryRespModel` objects from the database that match a given `requestId`. This function is likely used to fetch the results of a patient discovery request made to an external system.

## References
- `OutboundPatientDiscoveryRespModel`: A Sequelize model representing the structure of the outbound patient discovery response data stored in the database.

## Symbols

### `getOutboundPatientDiscoveryResp`
#### Description
This function queries the database for all `OutboundPatientDiscoveryRespModel` entries associated with a specific `requestId`.

#### Inputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| requestId | string | The unique identifier of the request for which to retrieve responses. |

#### Outputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| Promise&lt;OutboundPatientDiscoveryRespModel[]&gt; | Promise&lt;OutboundPatientDiscoveryRespModel[]&gt; | A promise that resolves to an array of `OutboundPatientDiscoveryRespModel` objects representing the responses associated with the provided `requestId`. |

#### Internal Logic
1. Uses the `OutboundPatientDiscoveryRespModel.findAll` method to query the database.
2. The query includes a `where` clause to filter results based on the provided `requestId`.
3. Returns the result of the database query as a promise.
